alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lee, northeastern Calhoun, western Sumter and southeastern Richland Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Oakland to Congaree National Park. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sumter, Shaw Air Base, Eastover, Mulberry, Congaree National Park, Oakland, Sumter County Airport, Gadsden, Millwood, Poinsett State Park, Elliott, Cane Savannah, Oswego, Dalzell, Dinkins Mill, Fort Motte, Wedgewood, St. Charles, Cherryvale, and Wateree River Correctional Institution. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
